author: hsiaowei
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.4.0-alpha.2` -- Trumpeter Swan -- released!

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.4.0-alpha.2

This is an alpha release for the coming Deneb upgrade with a patch of increasing `MAX_BLOBS_PER_BLOCK` size.

Plus, it adds Whisk (SSLE) experimental feature specs.
